title: Elon Musk adds Microsoft to lawsuit against ChatGPT-maker OpenAI
description: Mr Musk, a co-founder of the company, is accusing it and the tech giant of operating a monopoly.

title: ChatGPT firm OpenAI strikes deal with Vogue owner
description: The multi-year deal is the latest such agreement to be struck between OpenAI and a major media company.

title: ChatGPT reveals search feature in Google challenge
description: OpenAI is working on adding new search powers to its artificial intelligence (AI) bot.

title: Apple brings ChatGPT to iPhones in AI overhaul
description: The company has been slower to roll out generative AI features than rivals including Google and Microsoft.

title: AI products like ChatGPT much hyped but not much used, study says
description: Latest generation of products not becoming part of peopleâ€™s "routine internet use", researchers say.

title: ChatGPT to lose voice over Johansson similarity
description: The flirty, conversational upgrade to OpenAI's chatbot has been compared by some to 2013 film Her.

title: Reddit shares jump after OpenAI ChatGPT deal
description: OpenAI and Reddit reach deal that will give ChatGPT access to content on the social media platform.
